name: Whackerball
description:
Whackerball is a twin-stick shooter roguelite with Breakout inspired mechanics. Use your paddle to keep your ball airborne and dodge enemy bullets as you defeat odd enemies. Bounce and shoot your way through the 5 different biomes while acquiring powerful upgrades along the way!

Gameplay

  • Unique physics based combat system
  • Intense bullet dodging action
  • Various unlockables that change the way you play
  • Wide range of impactful upgrades to power up
